commentstreams-author-anonymous:
The name displayed for anonymous comment authors
{{Identical|Anonymous}}
commentstreams-toc:
This is the title of the comment list.
{{Identical|Content}}
commentstreams-buttontext-add: User interface button label. Upper case for stylistic reasons.
commentstreams-buttontext-reply:
User interface button label. Upper case for stylistic reasons.
{{Identical|Reply}}
echo-category-title-commentstreams-notif: Name of category on Prefences/Notifications page for CommentStreams notifications
notification-header-commentstreams-comme:
Flyout-specific format for displaying notification header of a new comment on a watched page.

Parameters:
* $1 - the formatted username of the person who commented.
* $2 - the comment title.
* $3 - the display name of the page being commented on.
* $4 - the username of the person who commented (for gender).
* $5 - the username of the viewing user (for gender).
notification-header-commentstreams-reply:
Flyout-specific format for displaying notification header of a new reply on a watched page.

Parameters:
* $1 - the formatted username of the person who commented.
* $2 - the comment title.
* $3 - the display name of the page being commented on.
* $4 - the username of the person who commented (for gender).
* $5 - the username of the viewing user (for gender).

Flyout-specific format for displaying notification header of a reply to a comment by the user.

Parameters:
* $1 - the formatted username of the person who commented.
* $2 - the comment title.
* $3 - the display name of the page being commented on.
* $4 - the username of the person who commented (for gender).
* $5 - the username of the viewing user (for gender).
notification-body-commentstreams-comment:
Echo email body.

Parameters:
*$1 - the username of the user authoring the new comment.
* $2 - the display name of the comment author.
* $3 - the title of the comment.
* $4 - the display title of the page being commented on.
* $5 - a link to that page.
* $6 - the wikitext of the new comment.
notification-body-commentstreams-reply-o:
Echo email body.

Parameters:
*$1 - the username of the user authoring the new comment.
* $2 - the display name of the comment author.
* $3 - the title of the comment.
* $4 - the display title of the page being commented on.
* $5 - a link to that page.
* $6 - the wikitext of the new comment.
notification-body-commentstreams-reply-t:
Echo email body.

Parameters:
*$1 - the username of the user authoring the new comment.
* $2 - the display name of the comment author.
* $3 - the title of the comment.
* $4 - the display title of the page being commented on.
* $5 - a link to that page.
* $6 - the wikitext of the new comment.
log-name-commentstreams: The Special:Log log name that appears in the drop-down on the Special:Log page
log-description-commentstreams: The Special:Log description that appears on the Special:Log page when you filter logs on this specific log name
logentry-commentstreams-comment-create: The template of the log entry message. No longer used for new entries
